Articles.Content:
Currently, with symmetry on, it is very difficult to make Rovers in the VAB because everything on one side of the symmetry is rotated in the wrong direction (If building vertically)

What would be nice would be able to set orientation of all symmetric objects so that they behave differently, I.E. mirror along an axis (when in 2x symmetry) or rotate along an axis.

grab Editor Extensions mod. This allows you to switch to SPH mirror mode symmetry in the VAB and vice versa.

really should become part of the stock game IMO
